content: around 144 st paw prints honour kline the cat and all our furry companions adapted from the haapsalu shawl page 131 double paw prints is a simple 8 stitch pattern with 16 rounds for the next 20 10x2 rounds knit 3 rounds complete the 16 rounds of the double paw prints round 1 k5 yo sk2p yo round 2 knit round 3 k2tog k1 ssk yo k3 yo round 4 knit round 5 k4 yo sk2p yo k1 round 6 knit round 7 knit round 8 knit round 9 yo sk2p yo k5 round 10 knit round 11 k3 yo k2tog k1 ssk yo round 12 knit round 13 yo sk2p yo k5 round 14 knit round 15 knit round 16 knit knit 1 round 288 stitch ring k1 yo around 288 st slanting twigs represent a walk in the forest with sun shining through the trees adapted from the haapsalu shawl page 119 slanting twigs is a simple 9 stitch pattern with 4 rounds for the next 40 10x4 rounds knit 2 rounds start the slanting twigs round 1 ssk ssk k2 yo k1 yo k2 round 2 knit round 3 ssk ssk yo k3 yo k2 round 4 knit repeat these 4 rounds 9 times in total 36 rounds knit 2 rounds © 2010 mwaa knit obsession http //www ravelry com/designers/mwaa knit ez 100th anniversary pi shawl camping page 4 576 stitch ring k1 yo around 576 st willow leaves celebrate the beauty of everything growing and green adapted from the haapsalu shawl page 105 willow leaves is a 16 stitch pattern with 12 rounds for the next 50 10x5 rounds knit 1 round start the willow leaves round 1 yo k3 yo sk2p yo k2tog yo k2 sk2p k2 yo k1 round 2 knit round 3 yo k5 yo sk2p yo k2 sk2p k2 yo k1 round 4 knit round 5 yo k2 sk2p k2 yo ssk yo k1 sk2p k1 yo k1 yo k1 round 6 knit round 7 yo k2 sk2p k2 yo ssk yo sk2p yo k3 yo k1 round 8 knit round 9 yo k2 sk2p k2 yo sk2p yo k5 yo k1 round 10 knit round 11 yo k1 yo k1 sk2p k1 yo k2tog yo k2 sk2p k2 yo k1 round 12 knit repeat these 12 rounds 4 times in total 48 rounds knit 1 round border k2tog yo around to produce eyelets waves and droplets represent water lapping up at the edge of the lake or river and rolling back across the sand and rocks based on judy gibson s edging http //tiajudy com/scallopedge htm the waves and droplets pattern starts out with a 9 stitch repeat round 1 reduces to 8 stitches round 2 increases to 9 stitches round 3 increases to 10 stitches round 5 increases to 14 stitches this results in 896 stitches 895 actually because the very last yarn over at the end of round 7 is skipped for the next 12 rounds not a multiple
